This is an assistance to the EAZKIT based on your requirements which you enter. Please refer to the user guide. I understand that the information I enter into this app needs to be stored and used, this should assist with the whitening process whilst using the EAZKIT.
A password reset pin will be sent to the email associated with this account. Please input the pin in the next screen to reset the password. The pin will be valid for 1 hour.
